Summary: This was a completely silent UFO at the time I remember it. Going NW at about 20 MPH. I flicked on the light to see what was going on (I heard I loud engine reving noise in my head) and out the window I saw this craft slowly hovering. With no lights.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kasson
There were no other sightings in Kasson on or around March 12th 1983
divs: Sighting DetailsThis light hovered right over my house...I have no idea what it was doing.....but I was outside with my gun......until we know what aliens have in store for us, our gun laws should remain intact
